attributes.action: We would like far more EU Citizens accents heard on UK TV and Radio programs
attributes.additional_details: EU Citizens living in the UK are TV License and Tax Payers also
attributes.background: Practically ALL of the accents and voices heard on UK TV and Radio shows such as News, Documentaries, Entertainment etc etc are traditional British. It is time, now, to have EU Citizens as presenters or narrators to represent the wonderful diverse make up of the UK

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an editorial decision for broadcasters.
